attributes.action: Pausing universities in the UK until the Coronavirus situation is dealt with
attributes.additional_details: As cases of the coronavirus rapidly increase, the act of pausing educational and similar institutions should become mandatory for the following reasons; the virus spreading from pupil to pupil, leading to a far more difficult situation, along with members of the pupils family and vulnerable elders becoming effected by this virus.
attributes.background: Putting a hold to large gatherings, for example, University lectures and classes where the virus is likely to spread at a far more effective manner.
